typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Loginemail as string,
		Identifier as string,
		Firstname as string,
		Lastname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> SRCADLTempEmail
SRCADLTempEmail sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'delta',
	fileSystem: 'import',
	folderPath: 'EmailCSV',
	mergeSchema: false,
	autoCompact: false,
	optimizedWrite: false,
	vacuum: 0,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DSTADLImportEmail
